0: ddd fff ddd fff dff dff ffd ffd ddf ||ddf ddf ddf ddf ffd ffd ffd ffd dfd
New key: the letter D. While leaving your index finger on the F key, type the D key with your left hand's middle finger.
1: k iii k iii k iii k iii k iii k iii ||kii kii kii kii kii kii kik kik kik ||ikk iik kii kki ikk kii kki kik iki
You will now be typing the I key by moving your middle finger up, then immediately moving it back down to its resting position on the K key. Make sure to only use your middle finger for this screen.
2: d eee d eee d eee d eee d eee d eee ||dee dee dee dee dee dee ded ded ded ||edd dde edd dde edd dde edd dde ede
Use the middle finger on your left hand to type the E key.
